title: Plaice with pea purée, bacon, new potatoes and asparagus
description: A healthy and delicious meal of steamed fish and vegetables.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a two-tier bamboo steamer.
ingredients: 3 whole plaice, filleted and skinned (or 12 fillets of plaice)
rapeseed oil, for dressing pea shoots
salt and freshly ground black pepper
